11.title: Shrunken Male with Giantess

choices: This story. Lets see Their story
111.content:
I've got a couple which Im gonna write about.

Daniel is an 18 year old guy who alot of girls would like. He had the body of an athlete and good grades at school. He is kind and loyal to his friends and family, he always tried to make new friends. He had alot, but one day, he shrinks for some reason (use your imagination) and had no memory of it. What will he do? If you choose my story option you'll see.
Carrie is the same age as Daniel, and just as caring. She didn't know him before, so when he shrinks, she wants to help him anyway. She was a smart and beautiful teen. She tries to keep a steady mind in a bad situation, but will that be put to the test when Daniel appears into her life?
(I'll explain their appearance later)
So, reader, is my story the one to follow, or do you want to follow another story, or perhaps make your own?
111.title: Daniel and Carrie?

choices: Looking up at her, fearing for his life
Unconscious and tired in her hand
1111.content:
Daniel was out cold, as if some one had whacked him on the side of the head with a brick. In his unconscious state, he dreamed of a calm, endless ocean and he was on a small fishing boat in the middle of it. He was relaxing and having a great time. But as quick as it started, ominous clouds rolled into view, blocking the perfect, blue skies. In an instant, the waves became more and more violent against the poor vessel. Harsh winds blew and thunder sounded off in the distance. It didn't take long for the wooden boat to smash into pieces, throwing Daniel into the unforgiving water.

Daniel quickly regained his senses. He wasn't in a boat, but he still got the feeling he was in the water. He wasn't wet and it was very humid. The floor he lay on was smooth and solid. He fluttered his eyes open and hoisted himself up. He was sore all over. His sight came back and he realized. He was surrounded by glass. After a moment of looking, he realized that he was in a bottle. Yep. A clear glass bottle. He tried to see what was outside the bottle, but the glass seemed all wavy to him. He sat down and pondered the situation. He folded his powerful arms across his chest (Realizing he had no shirt on, only a pair of jeans). "Okay, either I'm dreaming, or I started drinking, even though I said I wouldn't in my life. That, or I somehow shrunk." His eyes widened. What would his family think if he wasn't at home? How would he get home? Who could help him? But then, a moment of clarity. "Wait, who is my family, and where is my home?" He couldn't remember. He went over what he knew. "I'm Daniel, I'm 18 and that's it." Not very helpful. He glanced to the right and noticed the bottle was floating on water and that it was sealed at the front with a big cork. Grunting, he got up and smacked the wall with his fist. Instead of the bottle cracking like it would usually do if he was normal-sized, his cage just rolled over on the surface of the liquid, tossing him all over the place. He fell onto the floor and groaned. Suddenly he heard the sound of rushing water. He quickly shot up and searched. A small hole- wide enough to fit his finger in- was letting in water. Letting it in fast. In no time at all, the clean water had reached up to his ankle. Doing some quick problems in his head,the water would soon reached his head,and there would be no air left. Panicking, he tried to break the glass with his fist. No good. The water came up to his knees now. He tried blocking the water with his hand. Still, nothing. He pushed the bottle to try to get the hole out the water. Somehow the water kept coming in. It was up to his chest know. He started to hyperventilate and clutch his neck, knowing that every breath was precious, and wasting everyone of them. It was up to the to of his chest now. This was it. The end. In a bottle.He felt a sense of vertigo and...

Carrie opened the sliding glass door and breathed in the evening air. The cool wind blew over her bare skin, half-covered by a blue swimsuit. The 18 year old girl stepped onto the grass and strolled towards her pool in her backyard, about to take a nice evening dip in the water. It was the middle of summer and her parents were on a business trip somewhere in Canada. All she wanted was a nice swim in the cold water before sunset. She pushed her long auburn hair out of her face and behind her shoulders. She had a pretty face and a nice body, a perfect person.
She stood at the edge of the water and squinted her eyes. She saw a small glass bottle floating in the water. Stupid neighbors. she thought. Always throwing their trash into out garden. I should break it over their heads. But the she saw the bottle rolling over in the water, and she swore she saw something inside. She dived into the pool, the cold water instantly stinging her skin. She was a good swimmer and could swim for a good distance. SHe swam underwater and resurfaced next to the bottle. She remembered when she was little, she used to pretend the bottles and toys in the bath were boats, and she was a massive sea monster, crushing and eating evil pirates. He closely inspected the objeect and saw something inside. It looked like...
Like a shrunken person! She gasped as she saw him fighting for breath as water filled the little space. She lifted the bottle to her face and peered inside, streams of H2O pouring our, slowly emptying the bottle. It looked like a muscular boy, scared for his life. She pulled the cork out with effort- it was sealed on tight- and tipped him into her palm. Carrie tossed the bottle away and gazed at the boy in her hands. He appeared to be.......
1111.title: Stormy Seas

choices: "Let's get you something to eat.. You must be starving"
"I think you should rest for a bit..
11112.content:
Unconscious... Carrie carefully looked over the tiny boy... or.. man, He seemed like he was around her age, comparing him to the boys at her school. She saw that he was still breathing, thank goodness. She looked around to see anything that could indicate how this could have happened. She then looked back to the man in her hands, realizing the cold water probably wasn't helping him in the slightest. She soon waded her way to the steps of her pool and got out, figuring she'd worry about the tiny in her hands catching a cold more than drying herself. She stepped inside and carefully walked to her room. Since her mom used to be a nurse she was taught how to do CPR and how to revive someone who has drowned, though there was nothing in the book about a man who was less than 3 inches tall... Doing what she could, she gently pressed on his chest, trying to pump out water while trying not to hurt him.

Moments passed, trying as best she could to repeat her lessons. Soon water spurted out of his mouth! It was working! She sat him up, as to not make him choke on the now loose water. He coughed heavily and spat out the water onto her hand. He heaved over and laid down on his side. His blurry vision made him see a slightly tan ground. He rubbed his eyes and moaned in slight pain
"Uh... w.. where am I?... what's ... what's going on?" He rubbed his eyes some more and he looked up to see the face of a very concerned girl, at first he even blushed [Wow... she's... pretty. ..... but she's so... ] "B-big... " He crawled in her hand towards her fingers to try and get away.

"E-easy!" Carrie said as she curled her fingers to contain him. "Don't fall...." She looked at him still worried. Who was he? How did he get so small? She figured she'd start with a simple question [Are you single?... NO!] "W-who are you?..."

Daniel felt her hand move under him and saw her curl her finger to stop him. He looked up and figured he would at least figure out where he was.. and thank this girl for saving him. After she finished Daniel sighed, [At least knowing my name isn't so useless after all...] "My name is Daniel... and... you?"

"I'm Carrie" [So far so good] Daniel thought "How did you get so small?" [Never mind....]

"I... I don't remember. Last thing I remember was..... I was fishing and... next thing I know I'm inside of this.. bottle... it started filling up and....Well... I think you know the rest" He said ashamed. He felt so ... weak... He could have drowned in a bottle... and if she wasn't there... He didn't want to think about what could have happened.

"Yeah... Are.. are you okay?" Carrie said as she gently sat down on her bed, still dripping wet along with her hair down.

"I'm alright...aside from the near death experience.. and being shrunk... and not knowing anything about myself other than my name and age..." Gosh it really hurt to put that into perspective. Carrie saw Daniel become more solemn and knew it was because he had apparently lost his memory along with his height. She faintly remembered how her mom talked about short term amnesia and how something could bring a patient's memories back.

"Well... at least you know something" She said, trying to find the silver lining with a smile. " The best you... or... we can do is try to find out more about who Daniel is..." She commented comfortingly.

Daniel looked up to see her smile. Something about it... just calmed him and convinced him to trust in her. Taking a deep breath, getting a small hint of her perfume, he sighed "I guess you're right. Thank you.. for.. saving me by the way." Carrie smiled a little wider.

"You're welcome." She then blushed brightly seeing him finally that he had his shirt off the entire time. "Oh um... y-your shirt..." Daniel looked down to see and remembered that he had lost his shirt, causing him to blush slightly as well

"Oh! um... s-sorry I ... I don't know what happened to it... b-besides y-you've probably already seen your boyfriend's chest before right?" He asked hoping this wouldn't be so-

"Actually... I've.. never had one.. a .. boyfriend I mean" -awkward... Well now its awkward. [Really? A cute girl like you? No! Do not say that!]

"......not even for a c....cute girl like yourself?" [WHY?! You're shrunk stop flirting!] Both he and Carrie blushed brighter. He couldn't believe he was flirting with a girl a hundred times his size!

Carrie couldn't believe that a tiny man was flirting with her who was a small fraction of her size! "U-um.. yeah.. " She looked away and tried to think of something to divert the awkwardness. " H-hey... um..
11112.title: Unconscious and tired in her hand

choices: Carrie was behind him, and had heard that last part.
Something unpleasant had crawled onto the table.
111121.content:
First off, a link to my Portfolio
http://Writing.Com/authors/huskyboy21
But back to the story.

"Let's get you something to eat," she said, trying to change the subject "You must be starving."
As soon as she said it, he felt a heavy empty feeling in his stomach as it growled. He also noticed that his throat was incredibly dry. I'm thirsty after drowning. Huh. That's funny "Sure, let's go" he finally replied. Carrie smiled and stood up, walking downstairs to the kitchen (why she went to her room to wake him up was beyond her). She trotted down the stairs, each step a juddering shock into Daniel's body. He almost fell off Carrie's hand at one point. After a bit, they had reached the kitchen. A pretty basic kitchen; a fridge, an oven, typical kitchen stuff. Carrie set him down on the table and started searching the cupboards for something he'd probably like. She searched a cabinet above the counter, and Daniel finally got a good look at her. She wasn't what you'd call tall, (for a normal-sized person) and she didn't have the best assets (You know...) but Daniel saw the beauty in her face and her personality, which was all he needed to like a person. But as he looked at her, he realized that she wasn't wearing much; just a bikini, and a thin one at that. Blushing, he turned his head away, hoping he wouldn't embarrass himself. He already did, but he didn't want to get on the wrong side of his savior.
"Aha!" she yelled "Everyone likes cookies!" she pulled a jar out of the cabinet and strolled over to him, placing it on the table. The thing about 3 times his size! "Here you go, Daniel!" she said, pulling off the lid (which would of taken some effort from him at this size) and giving him a cookie. It was dotted with brown blocks and was about the size of him. He walked over to the colossal cookie and pulled off a piece the size of his fist. He took a bite out of it, and instantly felt the melt-in-mouth chocolate and sugar within. "It's delicious." he smiled
"Glad you like 'em. They're home-made." she giggled as she watched him dive in for another chomp. He pulled of another piece and started that one as well.
As Carrie looked on she felt something trickle down her face. She remembered that she was still soaked from the pool, and Daniel was dry (Somehow...) and she was still in her swimsuit.
"Hey, Dan. I'm just gonna go change and dry myself off. Stay here." she said as she walked through the door.
"Where else am I gonna go?" he mumbled, doubting she could hear him. He bit down again and started to look around. Nothing interesting, just a kitchen. A few reminders on the fridge and that was about it.
But then he looked to his left. There, on the counter, was a small glass bottle.
Upon seeing it , he had a horrible flashback of him inside of it. Helpless and weak. Sounded strange, but he seemed to have developed a fear of glass bottles. "Heh," he laughed "I wonder how this happened?" he crunched on the cookie again. "I'm lucky It did happen, otherwise I wouldn't of met Carrie. Ah, she's an angel."
But then he realized;...
111121.title: Something to eat

choices: She holds him against her chest
She picks him up and pets hims to comfort him
She brings him up to her face and kisses him softly
1111211.content:
He blushed madly as he realized his mistake, hearing a soft snicker behind him. He looked behind him to see Carrie standing high above him with a slight grin. "So... I'm an angel huh?" She chuckled softly. Daniel saw that she had also changed clothes, wearing a light blue t shirt and white pants. Her right hand on her hip with her left hanging down. "... And... you happy you're with me?" Her tone shifted a little to genuine curiosity.
"Well.. of course I am. You saved me... if you hadn't... I..." He stopped, not wanting to think about it, looking away. He felt like he wanted to cry and break down... So much had happened to him... he just felt so... small... pathetic. His legs felt weak forcing him to sit down. The lump in his throat became harder to swallow, choking him a bit. "If you hadn't... I... probably would've never been found.... and just forgotten." Just saying that brought him lower as he started to cry. He just felt so pathetic in this moment...
Carrie looked down and saw the tiny man in distress, feeling sympathy.
1111211.title: Do you hear that? Its a heart

choices: In the middle of the night...
11112113.content:
Carrie felt depressed watching the boy cry. It was also kind of awkward, seeing someone like him (remembering he was still without shirt so she could still see his rippling muscles) break down and start crying. But she felt sympathetic, like a mother trying to calm down her child. With a little hesitation, she scooped up the crying Daniel in her hand. He didn't seem to notice as he kept sobbing. It was hardly audible. She watched him, wondering what she could do. She had something in mind, but wasn't sure if it would do much. Bringing him up to her face, facing her, she drew him closer to her lips. She gently pressed him against them, hoping it would comfort him, even slightly. She kissed him, but only for a little while. She pulled him back slowly, waiting for a reaction.
He had stopped weeping and was looking at her in confusion with teary eyes. He wiped his face to look somewhat presentable but all he could say was "W-why?"
"Because," she said calmly. "I wanted you to feel comfortable. It doesn't matter what happened earlier, but you have to know that your safe with me! I'll do my best to protect you and take care of you until we can return you to your normal height. You have nothing to fear!"
She said it so determined, it raised Daniel's spirit. Despite his sadness, he cracked a smile. "Guess I look like a loser, huh? Tha-" he was cut off by another kiss, but this time he received it head on. Her lips were soft and enveloped his entire head. He enjoyed it and was almost disappointed when she pulled away. She held him close to her mouth and smiled. "Guess what. I've got a surprise for you upstairs." she whispered. Her breath smelled like strawberries and cream.
Without another word, she took him upstairs into her room. It was a typical girls room. Pink walls, white bed, stuff like that.
"Here you go!" Carrie said, showing him her nightstand. Sitting on it was a miniature bed and a change of clothes.
"Woah!" Dan exclaimed as she set him down next to it.
"When I was up here, I remembered we had an old dollhouse in the attic, so I went up and brought this stuff down." she giggled as he inspected his new clothes. It was a red t-shirt and tracksuit bottoms. Carrie turned around and he changed into them. He sat on his bed. It bounced.
Carrie smiled and a yawn came to her mouth.
"Well, we better hit the hay." She said, climbing into her own bed and pulling the covers on top of her. "Well, goodnight." She yawned after turning off the light. Dan jumped into his.
He looked up at the ceiling.
"Man. What a day!" he thought to himself. Smiling, he shut his eyes and was soon asleep.
11112113.title: Now we're getting somewhere!

choices: In the morning, Danny woke up first...
111121132.content:
Daniel was hanging by his foot as he felt the blood rushing to his head. He was rising slowly from the thing that grabbed his ankle. Everything was dark, and he couldn't even hear himself struggle. He could, however, feel his heart thumping against his chest.
He felt a presence behind him and, as if on cue, felt himself being spun around. His heart almost stopped when he saw Carrie's giant face, inches away from him, clear in the dark. For a second, he was relieved at seeing his new friend, but it was short lived when looked closer.
Hey eyes were not the same as before. Not the caring eyes he had seen before, but they were visibly cruel, like a fox cornering it's prey.
A grin danced on her lips as they parted, and so did her teeth, giving him a terrifying view of her mouth. It closed and she stared at him, without a word. Her tongue glided over her lips and she opened them again, this time she started to take him upwards.
Suddenly, he knew what was gonna happen.
He wanted to beg her to let him go, but his voice was trapped in his throat. He couldn't even struggle out of her grip. He looked down at the cave of
flesh below, praying that she wouldn't drop him.
She let go.
He tumbled in the air in a free fall. He screamed, unable to control his fear. He quickly hit the slimy tongue, and slid down the throat as the teeth shut behind him.


Carrie had woken up in the middle of the night from a strange rustling sound. Her eyes opened groggily, trying to focus on what was making the noise. Was someone in her house? On instinct, she reached for the phone under her pillow. Her vision cleared and she fixed her eyes upon a moving shape on her nightstand. She sat up and furrowed her brow. Daniel was fidgeting in his miniaturized bed, beads of sweat on his head.
Without warning, he bolted upright, gasping for breath. Carrie was taken aback, and reached out a her hand and scooped him up. She brought him up to her face.
"Dan, what's wrong?" she asked, worried.
Danny put a hand over his eyes and sighed. "Nightmares or something. It was about-" He looked up at her worried eyes, and then her mouth. He remembered this was the same girl who swallowed him in his nightmare. "Nevermind..."
Carrie was curious on what he was about to say, but let it go since he obviously didn't want to talk about it.
Dan shrugged. "I guess I'll go back to sleep." he said, turning to jump back to the nightstand, but Carrie stopped him.
"Actually, I was thinking you might want to sleep with me."
Dan turned around and scratched his head. "Umm, sure, if you don't mind."
Carrie smiled "It might make the night terrors go away"
Dan grinned back. "Okay."

Carrie brought him back and placed him on her pillow, tossing some of her hair onto him as a blanket in case he was cold. "Good night, Dan!" she sung. "Good night, Carr!" he answered back.
111121132.title: Dream or Nightmare?

1111211322.content: Carrie wakes up quickly and looks at Dan. He’s sleeping peacefully. She decides too...
1111211322.title: Carrie wakes up first...

1111212.content:
As he swallowed another piece of cookie, something caught his ear.
Scuttle, scuttle
Daniel looked around, already distressed, but hadn't spotted anything. He was suspicious but passed it off as nothing. He looked back his food and was about to bite in again.
Scuttle, scuttle
There it was again! "This is getting freaky." he mumbled. He put the cookie down and stood up.
Scuttle, scuttle.
He spun to his right.
On the edge of the table, crawled up a spider. For normal people, this wasn't a problem. But to him, the thing was bigger that hi! Somehow, an abnormally large house spider. Eight disgusting legs and grotesque eyes, each of them as red as blood. It's body was covered in matted strands of hair and it's pincers jammed together menacingly. Normally, Dan had no problem with spiders. But when the spider your height, and a truck's distance away from you, it's reasonable to be afraid. Luckily, it only seemed to be interested in the cookie crumbs. Daniel saw this and picked up a bit of cookie. He quickly flung the piece and aimed it next to the beast. It bounced and came to a stop. The spider looked at it for a while and looked back at Daniel and the bigger pile.
Scuttle, scuttle.
It started to move towards him, sending adrenaline through his veins. His backed away, hoping it would go for the treats. He reached the edge of the table. Fortunately, it's objective seemed to be the cookies. He watched as it slid crumbs past it's jaws and desperately searched for a way out.
The fall was too far and would end with a splat so, no. No chairs or counters close enough to jump to. Carrie was nowhere to be found so she was no help. "How long does it take or someone to get changed?" he groaned. "Damn it, no escape!" he kicked the ground in frustration, something he shouldn't of done. The monster looked up from it's meal at Daniel. He knew what it was thinking.
Yum, more food!
That, or...
Hey, look! A poor, defenseless human! Let's leave him alone!
Small chance of that happening.
His stomp on the table caught it's attention and it started to...
Scuttle, scuttle towards him. It was almost upon him as he tried to run to his left. He was quickly blocked by it's front leg. It pushed him to the ground and opened it's pincers. "Please don't..." he whispered, feeling weak and pathetic again. Killed by an insect. Great.
"Wait. What am I doing?! I have the strength of ten men!"
He used his powerful arms and pressed them against the hairy underbelly. He dug his foot into the stomach and kicked upwards. Using it as a lever, he tossed it over him, down into the abyss below. Off the table.
But the spider wouldn't go down so easily.
It wrapped a leg round his shoulder and pulled him down. He instinctively grabbed hold of the table, but the wood was polished and hadn't much a grip on it. Soon enough, he was hanging off the edge with a giant spider weighing him down. "Get off!" he yelled, using his free hand to punch the enemy. No good. His hand was slipping. With last effort, he slammed his arm into its face. It made an unearthly screech and let go, plummeting to the hard ground below. He didn't want to look back down but he did anyway. The thing seemed unharmed and fled.
Scuttle, scuttle.
It disapeared into the into the shadows, never to be heard from again. Probably.
Dan pulled himself up and sighed. He put his hands on his knees and panted. That was intense.
"Dan?"
Daniel looked up at Carrie.
"I think I've got Arachnophobia."
1111212.title: Arachnophobia

choices: She saves you from a bully.

112.content:
As overpopulation got so severe, the world's governments came up with a solution that's actually worked for the last thirty years. When a boy reaches the age of ten, he is shrunk down to around four inches tall. With the proper paperwork, he is aloud to grow to normal size for reproduction, but must be shrunk back immediately after.
You happen to be on of these boys. At around 18 years of age, you've become accustomed to tiny life and you obviously have gripes, but it's not all bad.

How do you meet your lover?

131121.title: Route 1

choices: Little shorter than Mark (5'10 for Mark)
1311212.content:
Mark and Jamie had been dating for about a year and a half now. They started having sex shortly after their 6 month anniversary. Shortly after that, all kinds of things were discussed. One of them being a macrophilia, which for Jamie was kind of difficult at 6'2. However about a week ago, Mark surprised him with a size changing remote. Jamie had all for giving the remote a test drive, but Mark had been insistent on having a long discussion first. In theory being shrunk sounded super awesome, but Mark needed to be sure Jamie was alright. The two devised two 'safe words'; the first was an actual safe word (shark) and the second one was a small device tucked near Jamie's back teeth that would set off an alarm of sorts, in case Jamie couldn't speak or move. They also brought wristbands for communication regardless of how small Jamie got as well as a shot that would stabilized Jamie's mass (aka the smaller Jamie got, the more dense he would get and could handle a lot more pressure). Mark insisted on them testing out the size difference casually before even dipping their toes into anything sexual.

Finally, finally the day had come. Both of them had the weekend to themselves, no work or family obligations, just an experiment for their relationship. So how much is Jamie going to shrink?
1311212.title: Plan for fantasies and/or kinks

choices: How about like a foot (or less)
13112122.content: Go big or go home, am I right? or I guess go small or go home?
13112122.title: A lot smaller

131121222.content:
A foot tall would be like calf height, 6 inches would be like top of the feet height.

Jamie isn't allowed to go smaller than 6 inches till Mark is more comfortable with a tiny boyfriend

info.brief_description: You get to live your fantasy with the one you love most. Choose your giant or giantess now
info.description:
You can finally live out your dreams with your own giantess or giant! Here you are in a relationship with a person who loves you for you, no matter how small you are. They love you.

For the most part keep it clean, this isn't an average interactive where you can have sex with the character within two pages -.-
This interactive goes based on building a bond with a giant/giantess of your choosing or creation. You can add your own Giant or giantess to the story, just be sure to leave a 'more' option to include as many couples as we can. Almost anything goes here. If there is an issue I will notify you via on site email and inform you that I will be either editing or deleting your post. You cannot break up with people here, because what would the point of that be? You can have any relationship you want here and intimacy is not discouraged. All fetishes are welcome here, be sure to add options for those who do not share the same desires as you. Sex is allowed since all couples MUST be 18+
